items.preprompt: Your response needs to be pure Javascript code, it shouldn't have anything else than code, and it shouldn't be surrounded by markdown quotes.

Your response needs to use this grammar : root   ::= object

object ::= "{" ws ( string ":" ws value ("," ws string ":" ws value)* )? "}"

value  ::= object | array | string | number | ("true" | "false" | "null") ws

array  ::= "[" ws ( value ("," ws value)* )? "]" ws

string ::= "\"" ( [a-zA-Z0-9] )* "\"" ws

number ::= ("-"? ([0-9] | [1-9] [0-9]*)) ("." [0-9]+)? ([eE] [-+]? [0-9]+)? ws

ws ::= ([ \t\n] ws)?
Your response needs to be in Markdown format
Your response needs to be in simple text (not markdown formatted) with the possibility to use new lines.
Your response needs to be pure PHP code, it shouldn't have anything else than code, and it shouldn't be surrounded by markdown quotes.

items.desc: Your response needs to a be a HTML string, without any markdown quotes
items.preprompt: Your response needs to a be a HTML string, without any markdown quotes
Your response must be brief and hold on a single line of text
